Borders

The theme.border section of your tailwind.config.js file allows you to override Tailwind's default spacing/sizing scale.

For more information see: Tailwind Documentation

Border Width (Tailwind documentation)

Class Properties
.border-0 0
.border-2 2px
.border-4 4px
.border-8 8px
.border-default 1px

Samples

border-0 (0)
border-2 (2px)
border-4 (4px)
border-8 (8px)
border-default (1px)

Border Radius (Tailwind documentation)

Class Properties
.rounded-none 0
.rounded-sm 0.125rem
.rounded-default 0.25rem
.rounded-lg 0.5rem
.rounded-full 9999px

Samples

0
0.125rem
0.25rem
0.5rem
